name: Space Cows (itch)
description:
Shadow is coming!

Space cows are the only salvation. They produce spice. The most precious substance in the Universe.

Every cow produce 1 spice per turn. Land hex can give up to 20 spice and then turn to sand. Place fire on sand hexes for 5 spice. It protects nearby hexes for 5 turns.

Get rid of Shadow!

Space Cows on Ludum Dare
